title: How to Save a Life
description: Brian "Mack" McCreary is living a bachelor's dream, with a budding career in emergency medicine, good friends, a supportive family, and any woman he wants. That is, any woman except her.Renata Dubois is the beautiful, free spirited, and oh-so-married nurse who likes to keep Mack on his toes. Their friendship tests the boundaries of propriety, but they never cross the line.Jennifer Williams is a tough-as-nails prosecuting attorney who wins Mack's heart, but can she let her guard down enough to let him into hers? Is she the right woman for him?
author: Sydney Blake
